cast.name: 卡塔琳娜·瓦克纳格尔 Katharina Wackernagel

director.name: 尤纳斯·高瑞斯 Jonas Grosch

introduction: Susi Q loves to travel. To dance. To get drunk. She loves women. She loves her best friend. She loves life! And now all that should suddenly change? Because she's getting "too old"? Take responsibility - Settle down with someone - Live a normal life - Like everyone else? NotSusi Q loves to travel. To dance. To get drunk. She loves women. She loves her best friend. She loves life! And now all that should suddenly change? Because she's getting "too old"? Take responsibility - Settle down with someone - Live a normal life - Like everyone else? Not Susi Q.  Susi Q.
